title: Igor Tudor to remain as Juventus head coach for 2025-26 season - The Athletic
snippet: Juventus have confirmed that head coach Igor Tudor will stay with the club for the 2025-26 season.

title: Welcome, Coach Luciano Spalletti - Juventus
snippet: 30 October 2025 · SHARE · Welcome, Coach Luciano Spalletti · Welcome, Coach Luciano Spalletti · Welcome, Coach Luciano Spalletti · Luciano Spalletti is the new head coach of Juventus, signing an agreement with the Club until June 30, 2026.

title: Juventus FC - Current and former staff | Transfermarkt
Juventus Parts Ways with Thiago Motta and Announces New Head Coach | beIN SPORTS
snippet: Juventus sacks Thiago Motta and appoints Igor Tudor as head coach until the end of the season. Motta, who arrived from Bologna, failed to meet Serie A expectations. Tudor, with experience at Udinese, Verona, and Marseille, will aim to secure ...

title: List of Juventus FC managers - Wikipedia
snippet: The following is a list of managers of Juventus from 1923 when the Agnelli family took over and the club became more structured and organized, until the present day. Includes all competitive matches. Statistics are correct as of 26 October 2025.
